text:
# Revision

The table below shows selected fields and data types in Micro-SQL access. Use it to create the following questions.

| Field    | Data types    |
|---|---|
| FullName    | Text    |
| NationalNo    | Number    |
| BOB    | Date and time    |
| Fees    | Number    |
| Address    | Text    |

1) What is the appropriate Data type for the fields?

2) If a 8-Access is running, describe the procedure to:

3) Create a table with fields above

4) Set the primary key as not no
